body.name: yesbeaut Bluetooth Thermal Shipping Label Printer, Wireless 4x6 Label Printer for Small Business, Compatible with iPhone, Android and Windows, Widely Used for Amazon, Ebay, Shopify, Etsy, USPS
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 23 hrs 10 mins
features: 🖨️【Printing via Bluetooth or USB】：Our shipping label printer supports Bluetooth connection with mobile phones/tablets (including Android and iOS), search and download the "steprint" or "OpenLabel+" APP from Google Play or Apple Store to achieve wireless printing and create various Templates (QR code, Excel, web page files, etc.) to easily customize labels anytime and anywhere! You can also connect via USB cable to print from Windows, Mac OS, Chrome OS, and Linux. (Install the JK-402A printer driver on the included USB driver before connecting)

🖨️【Custom Label Printer】: Supporting any brand of thermal labels from 1.5 inches to 4.25 inches in width, this label printer is built for small businesses and is compatible with nearly all shipping and e-commerce platforms. Allowing you to customize and print product labels, barcodes, product tags, thank you stickers, warehouse labels, QR code stickers, corporate or name stickers, etc. to help improve your productivity.

🖨️【High Speed & Print Clearer】: Advanced thermal technology makes our shipping label printers a smart choice for small businesses. Print at 150 mm/s, or one 4x6 label per second; the 203 DPI high-resolution print head makes labels appear clear, resistant to fading, and easy to read and scan. Shipping label printers for small businesses are truly ink-free, mess-free, cost-effective and time-saving.

🖨️【Designed for Small Businesses】: This thermal label printer can meet the needs of a variety of e-commerce and shipping platforms, including eBay, Amazon, Shopify, Esty, UPS, FedEx, USPS, ShipStation, Shipping Easy, Shippo, ShipWorks, Ordoro, and more. Note: Please download the labels from the corresponding platform first, and then upload them to the Steprint app for printing. No more waiting in line at the post office.

🖨️【Efficient & Portable Design】: The shipping label printer can automatically adjust the label position through its intelligent paper return function to confirm that each label is printed correctly. It has intelligent paper return, intelligent self-test and other functions to avoid paper waste or paper jams. Just install the driver, feed your labels, and start printing easily! The Bluetooth thermal label printer is compact and can be easily used in homes, offices and warehouses. It can be lifted with one hand and does not take up much space.

🖨️【Eco-friendly Thermal Printer】: With this desktop label printer, you can print labels that are clear, easy to read and scan without the need for ink or toner. It simplifies the process of printing labels and can be a great helper in helping you save time and money. At the same time, it is also more environmentally friendly. There will be no waste from ink cartridges and toner cartridges, which will not pollute the environment.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Connected within the App Bluetooth needs to be connected within the App, not directly without installing App Connection after installing printer driver Need install JK-402A printer driver before connection. Watching the video on the details page first Next page 1 Print via Bluetooth 2 Print via USB Cable

Previous page Without ink or toner Save the earth and save startup costs Please install the print driver before printing Save Time Print at 150 mm/s One 4x6 label per second 203 DPI high-resolution makes labels appear clear, resistant to fading, and easy to read and scan Next page 1 Thermal Printing 2 High-Speed & Quality 3 High-Definition 4 Package Included

How to install the printer driver? Check the usb driver included I always print out the wrong size. How can I fix it? Please ensure that the label size you use is the same as the label size you set up on the driver. For more detailed operation steps, please refer to the attached USB disk, or the installation video and instructions on the details page. What is the name of the printing application? "steprint", it is also called "OpenLabel+". Search "steprint" or "OpenLabel+" APP from Google Play or Apple Store to enjoy wireless bluetooth connection through the app. Why does the print dialog box sometimes appear in Chinese? This may be caused by setting up not correctly on Windows/Mac. Try uninstall and reinstall the driver. If it still could not help, please contact After-sales service. How do I connect a printer using my ipad and iPhone? Phones and tablets need to use the bluetooth to connect. You need to download the software from the App store or Google Play at first. Please note that the bluetooth connection needs to be made within the software but not directly search and connect.

Where should I find the driver? For PC users, Open USB flash drive attached→ JK-402A Printer Driver → Drivers and Software → MacOS/Windows. Mobile phone and tablet users can search and download OpenLabel or stepprint in the app store or scan the QR code on the detail page. Why can not connect to the printer? 1.Make sure the printer is turned on (Green light is on) 2. Bluetooth can only be used to connect to mobile phones or tablets, and Bluetooth needs to be connected within the software. the computer needs to be connected with a USB cable Why are the printed labels blurry and express delivery labels unusable? Choose PDF file formats or change high-resolution files to print. Besides, you can adjust the print density setting. And please clean the printer head regularly. Finally, any problems of product, please contact the seller for consultation

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This label printer is so easy to use and doesn’t require wifi! Takes very few minutes to set up and is fast and accurate at printing your labels :) very happy with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DONOT BUY. I wish I LISTENED TO THE REVIEWS
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. WORK ONCE AND NEVER AGAIN. I JUST SAT HERE FOR A HOUR TRYING TO FIX THIS. They DONT EVEN SEND THE APP ITS SUPPOSED TO USE IN THE BOOK OR ANYTHING YOU HAVE TO DO RESEARCH YOURSELF . Worse printer ever I’m telling you now donot waste your money . Literally terrible in all aspects

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is nice size. Speed and performance is excellent. I had to go on Amazon to download the app and directions since couldn’t see the usb driver in the box. But works great. Have to use it on my phone not my laptop

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Won’t connect. Returned
reviews.reviewText: Would not connect via Bluetooth or USB. Item wouldn’t even come up as an option for Bluetooth. When connected via usb to the computer, the printer showed up but would not connected. Returning item ASAP

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023

reviews.reviewText: no driver or app info in paperwork. no even sure it will work?

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for small business 🥰

reviews.reviewText: The item did not connect with the USB, so we tried by bluetooth and that did not work either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sad that I can't use with Bluetooth...
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my business do I can just print labels but during a test run, I couldn't get it to respond to bluetooth.I followed all directions and was able to connect it to my phone but it didn't respond to anything.I really thought this would be super efficient and easy to use but the bluetooth feature failed me.Other than that, I'm sure it's a great little printer. It even comes with additional labels to use which is awesome.
